lead_paragraph: An Alabama gun rights supporter who took a loaded pistol to the polls Tuesday got to vote, but only after putting the weapon in his pickup truck.

headline.main: Alabama Man Told to Disarm Before Voting
headline.print_headline: Alabama Man Told to Disarm Before Voting
